scopes.basic: to read any and all data related to twitter

get.description: Returns the 20 most recent mentions for the authenticating user

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Specifies the number of tweets to try and retrieve

parameters.name: since_id
parameters.description: Returns result with an ID greater than the specified ID

parameters.name: max_id
parameters.description: Returns results with an ID less than or equal to the specified ID

parameters.name: trim_user
parameters.description: When set to either true, t or 1, each tweet returned in a timeline will include a user object

parameters.name: contributor_details
parameters.description: This parameter enhances the contributors element of the status response

parameters.name: include_entities
parameters.description: The entities node will be disincluded when set to false

get.description: Returns a collection of the most recent Tweets posted by the User

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Specifies the number of tweets to try and retrieve

parameters.name: since_id
parameters.description: Returns result with an ID greater than the specified ID

parameters.name: max_id
parameters.description: Returns results with an ID less than or equal to the specified ID

parameters.name: trim_user
parameters.description: When set to either true, t or 1, each tweet returned in a timeline will include a user object

parameters.name: exclude_replies
parameters.description: This paramters will prevent from appearing in the returned timeline

parameters.name: contributor_details
parameters.description: This paramters enhances the contributors element of the status response to include the screen_name of the contributor

parameters.name: include_rts
parameters.description: When set to false, the timeline will strip any native retweet

get.description: Retruns a single Tweet

parameters.description: When set to either true, t or 1, each tweet returned in a timeline will include a user object

parameters.name: include_my_retweet
parameters.description: When set to either true, t or 1, any Tweets returned that have been retweeted by the authenticating

parameters.description: When set to either true, t or 1, each tweet returned in a timeline will include a user object

post.description: Updates the authenticating user's status

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: The text of your status update

parameters.name: in_reply_to_status_id
parameters.description: The ID of an existing status

parameters.name: lat
parameters.description: The latitude of the location

parameters.name: long
parameters.description: The longitude of the location

parameters.name: place_id
parameters.description: A place in the world

parameters.name: display_coordinates
parameters.description: Whether or not to put a pin on the exact coordinates a tweet

parameters.name: trim_user
parameters.description: When set to either true, t or 1, each tweet returned in a timeline will include a user object

get.description: Returns information allowing the creation of an embedded representation

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The tweet/status id to return embed code for

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: The encoded URL of the Tweet status to be embedded

parameters.name: maxwidth
parameters.description: The maximum width in pixels that the embed should be rendered at

parameters.name: hide_media
parameters.description: Specifies whether the embedded tweet should automatically show the original message in the case that the embedded Tweet is a reply

parameters.name: hide_thread
parameters.description: Specifies whether the embedded Tweet html should include a 'script' element pointing to widgets.js

parameters.name: align
parameters.description: Specifies whether the embedded Tweet should be left aligned

parameters.name: related
parameters.description: A value for the TWT related parameters

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Languages code for the rendered embed

parameters.description: response will use the callback with given name

parameters.name: resources
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of resource families you want to know the current rate limit disposition for
